name: INF-HSEQ CC0375-ITP-027 Guardrail and Fence - Rev.1
template name: INF-HSEQ CC0375-ITP-027 Guardrail and Fence - Rev.1

name: Ref docs - Issued drawings / Site copy drawings
Acceptance criteria - Check that you have the latest site and engineering drawings BEFORE starting each task/set of tasks.
Acceptance criteria - Prepare a lot map for traceability of the work area
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Correct class & type of rail or fence been supplied and free of defects
Acceptance criteria - Underlying services and/or assets have been installed prior to commencing works over and/or above.
Acceptance criteria - Setout rail positions to the location and levels on the drawings. This shall be presented for inspection by the superintendent.
Acceptance criteria - Length and location confirmed by the Superintendent
Acceptance criteria - Guard rail or fence run been installed as per the relevant specifications and drawings
○ Notwithstanding above specs, line and level of guard fence shall be adjusted where necessary to provide a smooth and even vertical and horizontal alignment
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
3.2 - Acceptance and closure of non-conforming items
Acceptance criteria - NCRs to be opened for non-conforming items and closed prior to closing construction lot.
